Class WarCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card
      • WarCard

  • public class WarCard
extends Card
    WarCard objects improve upon Card objects, adding functionality to help with playing War

    • Constructor Detail

      • WarCard

        public WarCard(int r,
               int s)
        Primary Constructor.
        Parameters:
        int - An Integer expected to be a value between 1 and 13, representing the card's rank.
        int - An Integer expected to be a value between 1 and 4, representing the card's suit. Should a value outside the expected be provided, the defaults wil be implimented, being "HEARTS" for suit and "ACE" for rank.

      • WarCard

        public WarCard(Card notThis)
        Copy Constructor.
        Parameters:
        Card - A Card object who's properites will be copied.

        public int compareTo(WarCard c)
        compareTo Method compares this WarCard to another WarCard
        Parameters:
        WarCard - Card to compare to.
        Returns:
        int difference between this card and parameter card (Aces High).

      • equals

        public boolean equals(WarCard c)
        equals compares this WarCard to another WarCard
        Parameters:
        WarCard - Card to compare to.
        Returns:
        boolean returns true if both WarCards are the same rank.

      • getFaceIcon

        public String getFaceIcon()
        getFaceIcon returns the file name of the face icon. (If card is "face down", returns "back.jpg" file)
        Returns:
        String File name of the card's face.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        toString Method
        Overrides:
        toString in class Card
        Returns:
